title: How to transfer ebooks from iPad to computer - Quora

response.answer_text: Syncios Mobile Manager can help you. The program has both free version and ultimate version to meet different needs. Free version allows us to backup personal information, apps, photos and more from iOS devices/Android phones to PC, transfer types of media files, like music, videos and etc. from PC to iOS devices/Android phones , freely download videos from websites, make custom ringtones and access file system. Obviously, you can transfer Ebook from iPad to computer via the program free of charge, we only need to install and open Syncios Manager, connect your iPad to the computer, tap ‘Ebook’ option under your device iPad. Check one or all files and then click ‘Export’ to transfer out of iPad.

I’m not sure what you mean by ebooks, but most ebook like apps like Kindle and Apples Books are available on any platform such as your phone, tablet or computer. You don’t have to do anything to read the same books on any of them other than install the app.
